translations: n.小肉片；薄肉片；皮肤的皱摺

phrs.translation: 小肉片, 皮肤的皱折, 薄肉片, 肉排

sentences.sentence: "If you're trying to alter your natural body rhythm, we don't adjust perfectly to that," said Dr. Nancy Collop, director of Emory Clinic Sleep Disorders Center.
sentences.translation: “如果你尝试着去改变你的自然的机体节律，我们不能完美的适应那样，”南希—克罗博士——埃默里临床睡眠混乱中心的主管说。
